chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (p : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a) (mults b p))

Premises:
pX : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)
canonical : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
multTerm : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Term A n
mults = fun (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)) => list_rec (fun _ : list (Term A n) => list (Term A n)) (pO A n) (fun (b : Term A n) (_ p'1 : list (Term A n)) => pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) p'1) p : Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) Arguments mults _ _%list_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
zeroP : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
plusTerm_is_pX : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)

pluspf_com : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p q : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p q) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec q p)

```coq
intros p a b Hca Hb.
assert (Hcan : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX A n a p)).
- apply plusP_inv1 with (a := a) (p := p) (q := nil); auto.
assert (Hcan' : canonical A0 eqA ltM (mults b p)).
- apply plusP_inv3a with (a := a) (b := b) (p := p) (q := nil); auto.
apply plusP_com with (r := mults b p) (s := pX A n (multTerm multA n b a) (mults b p)); auto.
Qed.

original: intros p a b Hca Hb. assert (Hcan : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX A n a p)). - apply plusP_inv1 with (a := a) (p := p) (q := nil); auto. assert (Hcan' : canonical A0 eqA ltM (mults b p)). - apply plusP_inv3a with (a := a) (b := b) (p := p) (q := nil); auto. apply plusP_com with (r := mults b p) (s := pX A n (multTerm multA n b a) (mults b p)); auto.
